data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
Marco Richter (Augsburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Augsburg.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Augsburg.
Augsburg needs to be cautious. Bielefeld have an attacking throw-in.
Patrick Ittrich signals a throw-in for Bielefeld, close to Augsburg's area.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
Bielefeld have a goal kick.
In Bielefeld Bielefeld drive forward through Ritsu Doan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Augsburg in the half of Bielefeld.
Throw-in for Augsburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 9, Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
Free kick Augsburg.
In the minute 10, Augsburg are coming forward and Marco Richter gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bielefeld.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 13, Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Augsburg's Michael Gregoritsch has run offside.
Patrick Ittrich awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Attention is being given to Augsburg’s Reece Oxford and play has been suspended briefly.
Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Bielefeld's Fabian Kunze has been booked in Bielefeld.
Augsburg's Reece Oxford is back in action after a slight knock.
Augsburg have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Bielefeld.
Can Augsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bielefeld's half?
Patrick Ittrich signals a Augsburg throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
Throw-in high up the field for Bielefeld in Bielefeld.
Bielefeld drive upfield and Sven Schipplock gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Augsburg defender.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
Patrick Ittrich awards Augsburg a goal kick.
Bielefeld to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Bielefeld.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
In the minute 29, Fabian Kunze for Bielefeld gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Augsburg have a goal kick.
Bielefeld's Ritsu Doan breaks free at SchücoArena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bielefeld.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Patrick Ittrich awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Bielefeld is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
In the minute 35, Ritsu Doan (Bielefeld) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bielefeld's Marcel Hartel misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
Bielefeld have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 41, In Bielefeld Bielefeld attack through Sergio Cordova. The finish is off target, however.
Patrick Ittrich awards Augsburg a goal kick.
Patrick Ittrich awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Augsburg.
Augsburg's Marco Richter gets in a shot on goal at SchücoArena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in high up the field for Augsburg in Bielefeld.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Bielefeld goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Patrick Ittrich blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Raphael Framberger for Augsburg has been booked by Patrick Ittrich and receives a first yellow card.
Patrick Ittrich has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Augsburg.
Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, In Bielefeld a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Augsburg at SchücoArena.
Free kick Bielefeld.
In the minute 50, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Sergio Cordova for Bielefeld who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Sergio Cordova is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Bielefeld.
In the minute 54, Patrick Ittrich signals a Augsburg throw-in in Bielefeld's half.
Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Augsburg's Marco Richter gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Bielefeld have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Augsburg.
Augsburg make their first substitution with Alfred Finnbogason replacing Marco Richter.
In the minute 60, Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
The away team replace Raphael Framberger with Robert Gumny.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Augsburg.
In the minute 61, Patrick Ittrich awards the home team a throw-in.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Ball safe as Bielefeld is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Patrick Ittrich.
In the minute 66, Bielefeld's Fabian Kunze attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Patrick Ittrich awards Augsburg a goal kick.
In Bielefeld Bielefeld attack through Sven Schipplock. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Augsburg at SchücoArena.
Free kick for Augsburg in the half of Bielefeld.
Ritsu Doan (Bielefeld) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 69, In Bielefeld a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Christian Gebauer is on a sub for Sven Schipplock for Bielefeld.
Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, Robert Gumny gets his shot on target but fails to score for Augsburg.
In Bielefeld a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 72, Free kick in a good position for Bielefeld!
Ruben Vargas is replacing Michael Gregoritsch for the away team.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
Can Bielefeld capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Augsburg's half?
In the minute 75, Augsburg to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Joakim Nilsson.
Anderson Lucoqui is replacing Joakim Nilsson for the home team.
In the minute 78, Patrick Ittrich signals a Bielefeld throw-in in Augsburg's half.
Free kick for Bielefeld in the half of Augsburg.
Marcel Hartel for Bielefeld gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bielefeld.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Bielefeld just outside Augsburg's area.
In the minute 80, Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Carlos Gruezo (Augsburg) has received a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Bielefeld.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Fabian Klos of Bielefeld smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Augsburg are pushing forward but Ruben Vargas's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 83, Patrick Ittrich awards Bielefeld a goal kick.
Throw-in Augsburg.
Jeffrey Gouweleeuw scores to make it 0-1 at SchücoArena.
In the minute 85, Great play from Daniel Caligiuri to set up the goal.
Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
Augsburg to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Bielefeld in their own half.
Sebastian Muller is replacing Marcel Hartel for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Bielefeld.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of Augsburg.
Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Bielefeld.
Patrick Ittrich signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Bielefeld push upfield but Patrick Ittrich quickly pulls them for offside.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
